effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with happiness, given by `happiness * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with happiness, given by `happiness * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with happiness, given by `happiness * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.

short_effect.sun_moon: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This full-power attack grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This full-power attack grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This full-power attack grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer.
